About.title: About Uniserve
About.subtitle: Empowering digital transformation through a unified and secure gateway.
About.content: Uniserve aims to facilitate access to data across various sectors securely and reliably. We strive to empower developers and companies to build innovative digital solutions relying on accurate and real-time data.
About.missionText: Facilitate access to data and enable digital innovation.
About.visionText: To be the leading unified digital gateway for services.

Developers.title: Build the Future of Digital Services
Developers.subtitle: Unified access to APIs, comprehensive documentation, and developer tools to build seamless digital experiences.

Docs.title: API Documentation
Docs.subtitle: Comprehensive guide to using our APIs
Docs.description: Learn how to integrate our services into your applications using unified APIs.
Docs.gettingStartedDesc: Learn how to set up your account and get your API key
Docs.authenticationDesc: How to secure your requests using API keys
Docs.selectMinistry: Select a sector to view documentation

quickStart.step1Desc: Sign up for a free account to get your credentials
quickStart.step2Desc: Copy your API key from the dashboard
quickStart.step3Desc: Add the key to your Authorization header

commerce.name: Commerce
commerce.description: APIs for verifying commercial registrations and business data
commerce.overview: Commerce sector services allow you to verify commercial registrations, get business data, and verify commercial licenses.

verify.name: Verify Commercial Registration
verify.description: Verify a commercial registration number and get business data

details.name: Business Details
details.description: Get full details of a business

justice.name: Justice & Judiciary
justice.description: APIs for verifying powers of attorney, deeds, and lawyer licenses
justice.overview: Justice sector services allow you to verify powers of attorney, property deeds, and lawyer licenses.

poa.name: Verify Power of Attorney
poa.description: Verify a power of attorney document

health.name: Health
health.description: APIs for verifying health practitioners and licenses
health.overview: Health sector services allow you to verify health practitioner licenses and medical facility licenses.

education.name: Education
education.description: APIs for verifying certificates and academic records
education.overview: Education sector services allow you to verify academic certificates and records.

hrsd.name: Human Resources
hrsd.description: APIs for employment data and Nitaqat ranges
hrsd.overview: HRSD services allow you to query employment data, Saudization rates, and Nitaqat ranges.

nitaqat.name: Query Nitaqat Range
nitaqat.description: Get the Nitaqat range of an establishment

traffic.name: Traffic & Transport
traffic.description: APIs for verifying licenses, vehicles, and violations
traffic.overview: Traffic services allow you to verify driving licenses, vehicle data, and query violations.

errors.401: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired API key
errors.403: Forbidden - You don't have access to this service
errors.404: Not Found - The requested resource doesn't exist
errors.429: Rate Limited - You've exceeded the request limit
errors.500: Server Error - An internal error occurred, try again later
